zone.line: but
Two years from my departure, and that then
The Lady who had left him, came again —
"Her mein had been imperious, but she now
Looked meek, perhaps remorse had brought her
low —
They lived Her coming made him better, & they stayed
for
Together at my father's. and I played
As I remember with the Lady's shawl
I might be six years old — but after all
She fe left him".. "Why, her heart must have
been tough —
How did it end..." And is not this enough
was
They met they parted..' '.Child is there no bore
Something within the interval which bore
The stamp of why they parted how they met
Yet
But if thine aged eyes disdain to wet
Those wrinkled cheeks with youths remembd. tears
Ask me no more, but let the silent years
For this is what to poets shall belong
They learn in suffering what they
